name: Grilled Pork Tenderloin
description: Fire up the grill and get ready for BBQ perfection with this easy 2 ingredient marinade! Grilling up a juicy pork tenderloin is simple with this delicious, citrus-forward marinade that helps tenderize the meat. Make sure to let the meat rest once it’s cooked to ensure maximum juiciness.
preparation: In Round or Multipurpose Steamer, whisk together marinade mix, juice, and oil.
Add pork to steamer; flip to coat. Cover; marinate at least 1 hour or overnight, up to 24 hr. Discard marinade.
Preheat grill to medium heat. Lightly brush grill with oil to prevent sticking. Grill for 15 min, turning once, or until instant read thermometer reads 160° F.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup rice and 1 cup grilled veggies.
